cs3041-18d-hci
Reading Schedule Syllabus

Reading Schedule

Updated: March 12, 2018

Week 1

Mon. 3/12 | Introductions + User-Centered Design

  • There will be a reading quiz on the following material.
  • READ: Our Syllabus
  • READ: Design Docs
  • READ (14 pages): Excerpt from: Don Norman’s “The Design of Everyday Things”
  • Read/Watch something else about the Human-Centered Design Process

Tue. 3/13 | Need finding + Task Analysis

  • There may be a quiz on this material. This is true for all future readings.
  • WATCH (12 minutes): Ethnography: Ellen Isaacs at TEDxBroadway
  • WATCH (4 minutes): EXAMPLE: Contextual Inquiry: Workforce Mobility
  • WATCH (3 minutes): Insight Through Need-finding
  • READ: Needfinding cheat sheet
  • READ: Become Your Users
  • READ: Task Analysis Tips
  • READ: How to Understand Problems by Andy Ko
  • READ: How to Define Problems by Andy Ko
  • Read/Watch something else about Need finding, Task Analysis, or Contextual Inquiry

Thu. 3/15 | Prototyping + Ideation

  • READ: How to be Creative by Andy Ko
  • READ: Ideation Overview (don’t answer survey questions)
  • READ: How to Prototype by Andy Ko
  • READ (17 pages): The anatomy of sketching (Bill Buxton)
  • READ (9 minutes): Why you should be prototyping (Netflix)
  • Read/Watch something else about prototyping or ideation

Fri. 3/16 | Human Abilities + Visual Design

  • DUE: Good/Bad Design
  • LOOK OVER: Design For Others Design Sprint
  • READ (80+ slides): Human Abilities
  • WATCH (7 min): The Universal Arts of Graphic Design
  • READ (7 min): How to Make Your Not-So-Great Visual Design Better
  • READ (7 minutes): 3 ways to improve your visual design skills
  • Read/Watch something else about visual design

Week 2

Mon. 3/19 | Visual Design Project Cont.

  • WATCH (10 min): Jennifer Golbeck (TED Talk). The curly fry conundrum: Why social media “likes” say more than you might think
  • Familiarize yourself with invision. See Slack for our free account code.
  • OPTIONAL: Google I/O 2013 - Cognitive Science and Design
  • OPTIONAL: Bad typography has ruined more than just the Oscars

Tue. 3/20 | Visual Design Hack Day

  • WATCH (17 minutes): Scott Klemmer: Heuristic Evaluation - Why and How

Thu. 3/22 | Data Visualization

  • WATCH (8 min): The Art of Data Visualization
  • READ (80 slides): Data Visualization
  • READ/WATCH: 39 studies about human perception in 30 minutes | Accompanying Talk
  • WEBSITE: Five Design Sheet Methodology for Visualization
  • OPTIONAL: Data Storytelling: The Ultimate Collection of Resources

Fri. 3/23 | Others Demo Day

  • DUE: Design for Others Demo

Week 3

Mon. 3/26 | Interactive Vis

  • DUE: Design for Others Design Doc
  • OPTIONAL: Interactive Data Visualization Slides (BIG FILE 450MB!)

Tue. 3/27 | User Testing + Hack Day

  • READ (22 slides): User Testing
  • WATCH: Rocket Surgery Made Easy: Usability Demo (Steve Krug)

Thu. 3/29 | Crowdsourcing + Social Psych

  • READ: How Uber Uses Psychological Tricks to Push Its Drivers’ Buttons
  • READ: HCI and Collective Intelligence (Jeff Bigham, Michael Bernstein, & Eytan Adar)
  • REFERENCE: People + Computation Slides – SEE Slack

Fri. 3/30 | Conversational Interfaces

  • READ (14 minutes): Technical and social challenges of conversational design
  • READ (9 minutes): How to design a robust chatbot interaction
  • READ: Conversation Design: Speaking the Same Language (Google)
  • READ: HCI for Peace: A Call for Constructive Action
  • WATCH: Watch a talk from the HCI for Peace Conference

Week 4

Mon. 4/2 | Understanding Demos

  • DUE: Design for Understanding Demo

Tue. 4/3 | Chatbot Hack Day

  • DUE: Design for Understanding Doc
  • Work on chatbots

Thu. 4/5 | 3D User Interfaces + Fun

  • WATCH (17 minutes): The Wekinator by Rebecca Fiebrink
  • READ: 32.1-2, 32.4-5: 3D User Interfaces
  • WATCH (8 min): Bill Buxton on Natural User Interfaces
  • READ (7 pages): Make Things Engaging

Fri. 4/6 | Chatbot Hack Day

  • READ: 8 Prototypes that Show the Future of HCI
  • READ (4 pages): Gesture Interfaces: A Step Backward in Usability

Week 5

Mon. 4/9 | Input Technologies and Techniques

  • DUE: Design for Tension Demo
  • READ (35 pages): Input Technologies and Techniques (Ken Hinckley and Daniel Wigdor)

Tue. 4/10 | Affective Computing

Start Design for Wellbeing

  • DUE: Design for Tension Doc

Reading and Watching Track

  • WATCH (~16 minutes): Rafael Calvo: Time for Technologies to Respect our Psychological Needs
  • READ (short): We Need Computers with Empathy
  • READ (short): Why you want your Drone to have Empathy
  • WATCH (~45 minutes): Rosalind Picard: Emotion Technology
  • READ (short): Affective Computing for HCI
  • For Reference (Optional): Affective Computing by Kristina Höök

Javascript and JQuery (Do enough to know basics)

  • Intro to JQuery Codecademy
  • Learn JQuery Core
  • Look over and understand the code from Design for Wellbeing

Thu. 4/12 | Affectiva Hack Day

Hack on Affectiva!

  • WATCH (20 minutes): The Future of Affective Computing

Fri. 4/13 | Wellbeing midpoint Demo Day

Week 6

Mon. 4/16 | Patriots’ Day Holiday

No class. Patriots’ Day.

Tue. 4/17 | Intelligent User Interfaces

  • READ (Intro + Principles): Principles of Mixed-Initiative User Interfaces (Eric Horvitz)
  • READ (Intro + Usability Principles): Steps to Take Before Intelligent User Interfaces Become Real (Kristina Höök)

Thu. 4/19 | Design for Wellbeing Demo Day

  • DUE: Design for Wellbeing Demo

Fri. 4/20 | WPI Project Presentation Day

No class. WPI Project Presentation day.

Week 7

Mon. 4/23 | Virtual Reality (+ some Augmented Reality)

  • DUE: Design for Wellbeing Doc

Start Design for Another World

  • READ (7 min): Applying human-centered design to emerging technologies (IDEO)
  • READ (20 pages): Virtual Reality Introduction by Steven M. LaValle
  • READ (7 minutes): Design Practices in Virtual Reality
  • READ (short): AR Human Interface guidelines by Apple

SKIM OVER THE FOLLOWING FOR IDEAS!

  • Opioids haven’t solved Chronic Pain. Maybe Virtual Reality Can (WIRED)
  • ‘After I feel ecstatic and emotional’: Could Virtual Reality Replace Therapy
  • Can VR Really Make You More Empathetic? (WIRED)
  • VRST 2017 Technical Papers Preview

Tue. 4/24 | VR Hack Day

Hack on VR!

Thu. 4/26 | VR Hack Day

Hack on VR!

  • READ: Dystopian Virtual Reality is Finally Here (Ian Bogost)
  • READ: Virtual Reality Frontiers (Steven M. Lavalle)

Fri. 4/27 | VR Demo Day

  • DUE: Design for Another World Demo

Week 8

Mon. 4/30 | Lunch-Hour Demos!

  • DUE: Design for Another World Doc
  • OPTIONAL!: Bring out our favorite demos for food + a lunch-hour demo event.

Tue (Fri). 5/1 | Where do we go from here?

  • Wrap-up: Last Day of the Term.
